      • decode

        public void decode(MapStyle mapStyle,
          org.w3c.css.sac.Selector selector,
          java.lang.String name,
          org.w3c.css.sac.LexicalUnit value,
          java.net.URI sourceURI)
            throws ParseException,
                   java.io.IOException
        Decodes the passed "name" and "value" within the passed selector, and writes the appropriate style information to the passed MapStyle.
        Parameters:
        mapStyle - The style to decode into.
        selector - The selector to decode.
        name - The name of the property to decode.
        value - The value of the property to decode.
        Throws:
        NoStyleExistsException
        NoSuchFilterException
        MalformedSelectorException
        MalformedDeclarationException
        java.io.IOException
        ParseException
